full_text: Besa] oy mend Capea 2019/KER/227 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW FRIDAY, THE O4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 14TH POUSHA, 1940 Crl1.MC.No. 37 of 2019 CRIME NO. 1776/2018 OF MATTANCHERRY POLICE STATION, ERNAKULAM PETITIONER/S: NAUSHI NAZAR, AGED 43 YEARS W/O.NAZAR ABOOBAKER, H.NO.C.C.8/1385, TD EAST ROAD, MATTANCHERY, KOCHI-2. BY ADV. SRI.M.H.HANIS RESPONDENT/S: 1 K.C.SATHEESHAN, AGED 41 YEARS S/O.CHENNAPPU, KANDAMPULLY HOUSE, KALLOOR P.O., VADAKKEKKAD, THRISSUR DISTRICT, PIN- 679562. 2 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, MATTANCHERY POLICE STATION, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT, REP. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, PIN- 682031. BY ADV. SRI.P.A.MUJEEB OTHER PRESENT: SRI. ALEX M THOMBRA SR PP 2019/KER/227 Crl.MC.No. 37 of 2019 1i2.. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. The petitioner is the accused in Crime No. 1776 of 2018 of Mattanchery Police Station registered for the offences under Sections 468 & 420 of the Indian Penal Code. The first respondent is the victim. It is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the criminal case may be quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner and the first respondent and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4, I have perused the affidavit filed by the first respondent, who has entered appearance through counsel. I am satisfied that the allegation of settlement is true and no public Perl z eet a ops 2019/KER/227 Crl.MC.No. 37 of 2019 1.3.. interest is involved. There is no impediment for granting the prayer of the petitioner. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed. The proceedings in Crime No. 1776 of 2018 of Mattanchery Police Station are quashed. The learned magistrate may pass appropriate orders for the disposal of the material objects, if any, produced in the case. Sd/- K. ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.1776/2018 OF MATTANCHERY POLICE STATION, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT. ANNEXURE B AFFIDAVIT OF THE 1ST RESPONDENT. Bka/07.01.2019
